content.text: Our Mazda Connect™ Infotainment System<sup des="c1,1" class="disclosure-text feature-desclaimers">1</sup> creates a seamless connectivity that allows you to focus on the drive. Apple CarPlay™<sup des="c2,2" class="disclosure-text feature-desclaimers">2</sup> is now standard in all 2021 Mazda MX-5 models and Grand Touring models are further enhanced by a wireless connection to Apple CarPlay™<sup des="c2,2" class="disclosure-text feature-desclaimers">2</sup> through your compatible iPhone®.

content.heading: STAY WITHIN REACH
content.text: With the MX-5 Miata’s Commander control, you can intuitively navigate through playlists, driving directions, contacts and more without taking your eyes off the road.<sup des="c3,1" class="disclosure-text feature-desclaimers">1</sup>

disclaimer.text: 1 Don’t drive while distracted. Even with voice commands, only use Mazda Connect™/other devices when safe. Some features may require cellular or Wi-Fi service; some features may be locked out while the vehicle is in motion. Not all features are compatible with all phones. Message and data rates may apply.

content.heading: OPTIMAL LISTENING WITH BOSE®
content.text: The sounds of the open road deserve a worthy complement. And the available 9-speaker Bose® audio system is just that. With speakers specifically tuned and oriented for the MX-5’s cabin, it delivers a pitch perfect acoustic experience, even with the top down. What’s more, a 3-year traffic and travel link subscription to SiriusXM<sup des="c4,3" class="disclosure-text feature-desclaimers">3</sup> is also available to enjoy.

disclaimer.text: 3 SiriusXM audio and data services each require a subscription sold separately, or as a package, by Sirius XM Radio Inc. If you decide to continue service after your trial, the subscription plan you choose will automatically renew thereafter and you will be charged according to your chosen payment method at then-current rates. Fees and taxes apply. To cancel you must call SiriusXM at 1-866-635-2349. See SiriusXM Customer Agreement for complete terms at www.siriusxm.com. All fees and programming subject to change. Current information and features may not be available in all locations. Sirius, XM and all related marks and logos are trademarks of Sirius XM Radio Inc.

content.heading: i-ACTIVSENSE® SAFETY TECHNOLOGY
content.text: When it comes to a transcendent driving experience, confidence is everything. With i-Activsense® safety technology,<sup des="c1,1" class="disclosure-text feature-desclaimers">5</sup> sophisticated safety features alert you to hazards to help you avoid collisions—or lessen their impact.

disclaimer.text: 5 i-Activsense® safety features are not a substitute for safe and attentive driving. There are limitations to the range and detection of each safety feature. Safety features vary based on vehicle package and trim combinations. Please see your Owner’s Manual for further details.

content.heading: ADAPTIVE FRONT-LIGHTING SYSTEM
content.text: This available system is designed to help you see around corners at night. As you turn a corner, the headlights pivot in the direction of your turn, improving visibility and allowing you to spot potential hazards ahead.

content.heading: TRAFFIC SIGN RECOGNITION
content.text: To help you stay alert and informed, the available Traffic Sign Recognition System<sup des="c3,1" class="disclosure-text feature-desclaimers">7</sup> can show you Speed Limit, Stop and Do Not Enter information in the MX-5 Miata’s 4.6-inch full-color LCD display. The system’s strategically mounted camera scans for road signs, so you can keep your focus on what’s ahead.

disclaimer.text: 7 Traffic Sign Recognition System is not a substitute for safe and attentive driving. Factors including weather and the condition of the traffic sign can impact recognition or display of the sign. Always check traffic signs visually while driving. Please see your Owner’s Manual for further details.

content.heading: REAR CROSS TRAFFIC ALERT
content.text: When backing up, this feature helps detect a vehicle approaching from the side and promptly alerts the driver with an audible warning,<sup des="c4,1" class="disclosure-text feature-desclaimers">4</sup> as well as a visual warning, in either side mirror and the display screen.

disclaimer.text: 4 Always check your mirrors. Be aware of the traffic around you. There are limitations to the range and detection of the system. Please see your Owner’s Manual for further details.

content.heading: ELEGANCE IS IN THE DETAILS
content.text: Refined details are integral to the joy of driving. And you’ll find them throughout the MX-5. New for 2021, available White Nappa leather seats bring a rejuvenating touch to Grand Touring interiors.

content.heading: TIMELESS STYLE
content.text: The MX-5 Miata convertible is inspired by classic roadsters of the 1960s. But that inspiration is expressed in a way that’s pure Mazda. With the sleek lines of our Kodo design, it communicates a sense of fluid motion, even at a standstill—and practically begs to be driven.

content.heading: AN EXTENSION OF YOU
content.text: 181 hp. 151 lb-ft of torque. A curb weight of under 2,400 pounds. <sup des="c1,1" class="disclosure-text feature-desclaimers">1</sup>Behind the wheel of the MX-5 Miata, numbers transform into beautifully visceral, windswept joy. One of the many secrets to this exhilarating drive lies in its ideal power-to-weight ratio. You feel as though your MX-5 is connected to you, anticipating and answering your every command.

disclaimer.text: 1 Manual transmission models.

content.heading: NEAR PERFECT BALANCE
content.text: Every Mazda is engineered with the driver in mind. And nowhere is that clearer than in the MX-5 Miata. When working to achieve its near perfect 50/50 weight distribution, we made a point to take our measurements with a driver behind the wheel. The MX-5 Miata’s storied handling doesn’t start with a spec sheet. It starts with you.

content.heading: SHEET METAL CLOAKED IN SEDUCTION
content.text: At first glance, the MX-5 RF captivates your attention and won’t let go. The flowing lines of its silhouette accentuate the styling and tear drop shaped cabin. When the open air beckons, the rigid hardtop retracts into the trunk, in about 13 seconds, without sacrificing space for your weekend getaway essentials.

content.heading: THE DETAILS OF INDULGENCE
content.text: Refined details are integral to the joy of driving. Sophisticated accents are showcased throughout the MX-5 Miata RF cabin. New for 2021, available White Nappa leather seats bring a rejuvenating touch to Grand Touring interiors.

content.heading: DESIGNED TO SEDUCE. ENGINEERED TO ASTOUND.
content.text: Drawing from the purity of the MX-5 Miata Roadster, the MX-5 Miata RF connects car and driver with elegance and ingenuity. Its Skyactiv®-G 2.0 engine delivers 181 hp and 151 lb-ft of torque to create an ideal power-to-weight ratio. The placement of this engine helps the MX-5 RF maintain a nearly perfect 50/50 weight balance.Behind the wheel, you feel as though your MX-5 RF is an extension of your body, anticipating and answering your every command.

content.heading: REMOTE OPERATIONS
content.text: Start your engine, and lock and unlock doors remotely using the MyMazda App through your smart phone.<sup des="c1,1" class="disclosure-text feature-desclaimers">4</sup>

disclaimer.text: 4 Connected services are subject to change at any time without notice. Mazda Connected Services is provided during a 3-year trial period; annual subscription fees apply thereafter. Use of MyMazda App and compatible phone are required. Connected services require cellular or Wi-Fi service. Data fees may apply. Never drive while distracted or while using a hand-held device. Please see your Owner’s Manual for important feature details and related privacy information.

content.heading: VEHICLE FINDER
content.text: Forgot where you parked your car? The MyMazda App pins the location of your vehicle on the map and shows you its exact spot, as well as activates the hazard lights and horn to make it easier to find.<sup des="c2,1" class="disclosure-text feature-desclaimers">4</sup>

disclaimer.text: 4 Connected services are subject to change at any time without notice. Mazda Connected Services is provided during a 3-year trial period; annual subscription fees apply thereafter. Use of MyMazda App and compatible phone are required. Connected services require cellular or Wi-Fi service. Data fees may apply. Never drive while distracted or while using a hand-held device. Please see your Owner’s Manual for important feature details and related privacy information.

content.heading: VEHICLE HEALTH REPORT
content.text: The MyMazda App will proactively notify you when something may need your attention. Find out when your fuel, oil, lights or tire pressure needs to be checked or when it’s time for service before possible mishaps occur on the road.<sup des="c3,1" class="disclosure-text feature-desclaimers">4</sup>

disclaimer.text: 4 Connected services are subject to change at any time without notice. Mazda Connected Services is provided during a 3-year trial period; annual subscription fees apply thereafter. Use of MyMazda App and compatible phone are required. Connected services require cellular or Wi-Fi service. Data fees may apply. Never drive while distracted or while using a hand-held device. Please see your Owner’s Manual for important feature details and related privacy information.

content.heading: CHECK YOUR MAZDA’S STATUS
content.text: Designed to help you plan your trips, the MyMazda App lets you check fuel, odometer, tire pressure and other vehicle conditions before you head out for a drive.<sup des="c4,1" class="disclosure-text feature-desclaimers">4</sup>

disclaimer.text: 4 Connected services are subject to change at any time without notice. Mazda Connected Services is provided during a 3-year trial period; annual subscription fees apply thereafter. Use of MyMazda App and compatible phone are required. Connected services require cellular or Wi-Fi service. Data fees may apply. Never drive while distracted or while using a hand-held device. Please see your Owner’s Manual for important feature details and related privacy information.

content.heading: TRAFFIC JAM ASSIST
content.text: Remove some of the stress from your daily commute with Traffic Jam Assist<sup des="c1,1" class="disclosure-text feature-desclaimers">6</sup> which enhances the Mazda3’s Mazda Radar Cruise Control with low-speed steering assist at speeds of up to 40 mph.

disclaimer.text: 6 Traffic Jam Assist is not a substitute for safe and attentive driving. There are limitations to the range and detection of the system. Please see your Owner’s Manual for further details.

content.heading: FRONT AND REAR PARKING SENSORS
content.text: Parking becomes easy with the Mazda3’s easy-to-use front and rear parking sensors.<sup des="c2,1" class="disclosure-text feature-desclaimers">7</sup> A warning will sound when the sensors detect you’re close to an object and increase in frequency as you get closer.

disclaimer.text: 7 Always check your mirrors. Be aware of your surroundings. There are limitations to the range and detection of the system. Please see your Owner’s Manual for further details.

content.heading: 360° VIEW MONITOR
content.text: Experience greater awareness in every direction with the 360° View Monitor.<sup des="c3,1" class="disclosure-text feature-desclaimers">8</sup> By using small cameras mounted on the front, back and sides of the car, the available 360° View Monitor displays various views around the car on the Mazda Connect™ screen.

disclaimer.text: 8 360º View Monitor may not provide a comprehensive view of the entire surrounding area of this vehicle. Always check your surroundings visually. Please see your Owner’s Manual for further details.

content.heading: REAR CROSS TRAFFIC ALERT AND SMART BRAKE SUPPORT-REAR CROSSING
content.text: When backing up, available Rear Cross Traffic Alert<sup des="c4,1" class="disclosure-text feature-desclaimers">10</sup> helps detect a vehicle approaching from the side and promptly alerts the driver with an audible warning, as well as a visual warning, in either side mirror and the Rear View Monitor display. If the system predicts an impact, models equipped with Smart Brake Support–Rear Crossing<sup des="c4,2" class="disclosure-text feature-desclaimers">9</sup> can automatically brake to help avoid a collision or reduce damage in the event of a collision.

disclaimer.text: 10 Always check your mirrors. Be aware of the traffic around you. There are limitations to the range and detection of the system. Please see your Owner’s Manual for further details.

9 Smart Brake Support–Rear Crossing operates under certain conditions when a vehicle approaches from the rear left or rear right while you reverse out of a parking space. It is not a substitute for safe and attentive driving and is only designed to reduce damage in the event of a collision. There are limitations to the operation and detection of the system. Please see your Owner’s Manual for further details.

content.heading: CARBON EDIITON: STYLE NEVER STOPS
content.text: Style is not static. It’s constantly in flux. Always on the move. The Polymetal Gray Metallic exterior, 18” black alloy wheels and black heated side mirrors of our new Mazda3 2.5 S Hatchback Carbon Edition boldly accentuate the dynamism of each drive, as you express your style wherever you go.

content.heading: CONTOURS THAT CAPTIVATE
content.text: Kodo: “Soul of Motion,” Mazda’s design philosophy, seeks to create a sense of motion, even at a standstill. With curves and angles so striking, they command your attention at first glance. The Mazda3 Hatchback presents a poised and dignified aesthetic that beckons to be driven.

content.heading: REDEFINING REFINEMENT
content.text: Meticulously crafted by the Mazda Takumi, the Mazda3 feels as if it were built just for you. Sophisticated upholstery palette choices are available in warm Greige tones or Red leather to create a welcoming and modern environment. An elegant level of refinement where every inch is designed to make your driving experience better.

content.heading: A PERFECT FIT
content.text: The cockpit of the Mazda3 is in perfect symmetry with you. For decades, we’ve studied the human body: how it moves, sensations of touch, sound and sight, muscle and skeletal structure. Every consideration has been made so the Mazda3 effortlessly responds to your direction.

content.heading: EFFORTLESS PERFORMANCE
content.text: Just beyond the velvet ropes of convention, the Mazda3 2.5 Turbo Hatchback awaits with the motor running. With up to 250 hp1 and up to 320 lb-ft of torque,1 coupled with our i-Activ AWD®, this hatchback responds instantly and smoothly to every urge and impulse.

disclaimer.text: 1 250 hp and 320 lb-ft of torque with 93 octane fuel. 227 hp and 310 lb-ft of torque with 87 octane fuel.

content.heading: REFINED PERFORMANCE
content.text: Poised to take on the road with even more authority, the Mazda3 is available with a responsive Skyactiv®-G 2.5 Turbo engine that delivers up to 250 hp1 and up to 320 lb-ft of torque.1 Paired with i-Activ AWD®, 2.5 Turbo models deliver a more confident, invigorating driving experience.

disclaimer.text: 1 250 hp and 320 lb-ft of torque with 93 octane fuel. 227 hp and 310 lb-ft of torque with 87 octane fuel.

content.heading: G-VECTORING CONTROL PLUS
content.text: Every aspect is designed to work with you. G-Vectoring Control Plus responds to steering inputs with subtle engine torque and braking adjustments. The system provides enhanced stability for a smoother drive.

content.preheading: MORE PERFORMANCE. MORE EFFICIENCY. MORE ENJOYMENT.
content.heading: SKYACTIV® TECHNOLOGY
content.text: Every aspect of the Mazda3 is engineered to work in harmony with you. The suspension considers the way the human body moves naturally—and balances to the car’s movements—for extraordinary handling and comfort. And the engine technology offers impressive fuel efficiency<sup des="c4,1" class="disclosure-text feature-desclaimers">7</sup> without compromising performance. Countless efforts have been made to enhance the joy from driving through a completely holistic, smarter approach.

disclaimer.text: 7 Based on EPA estimates for 2022 Mazda3 2.5 S Hatchback with Premium Package and FWD, 26 city/34 highway MPG. Mazda3 2.5 S Hatchback AWD shown with Premium Package, 25 city/31 highway MPG.

content.heading: ONE STEP AHEAD
content.text: Each element of the CX-9 was created for you to enjoy with those who matter most to you. Our standard i-Activsense® suite of sophisticated safety innovations can alert you to hazards and help you avoid collisions—or lessen their impact.<sup des="c1,1" class="disclosure-text feature-desclaimers">1</sup> Because the difference between a good drive and an inspiring one is confidence.

disclaimer.text: 1 i-Activsense® safety features are not a substitute for safe and attentive driving. There are limitations to the range and detection of each safety feature. Safety features vary based on vehicle package and trim combinations. Please see your Owner’s Manual for further details.

content.heading: ADV. SMART CITY BRAKE SUPPORT WITH PED. DETECTION
content.text: Advanced Smart City Brake Support with Day and Night-time Pedestrian Detection<sup des="c2,2" class="disclosure-text feature-desclaimers" >14</sup> helps detect vehicles and pedestrians in your path. If an impact is predicted, the system will warn the driver and, if necessary, apply the brakes.

disclaimer.text: 14 Advanced Smart City Brake Support with Day and Night-time Pedestrian Detection operates under certain conditions between about 2 and 50 mph when object is a vehicle and between about 6.2 to 50 mph when the object is a pedestrian. It is not a substitute for safe and attentive driving and is only designed to reduce damage in the event of a collision. There are limitations to the operation and detection of the system. Please see your Owner’s Manual for further details.

content.heading: BLIND SPOT MONITORING W/ REAR CROSS TRAFFIC ALERT
content.text: Blind Spot Monitoring<sup des="c3,3" class="disclosure-text feature-desclaimers">12</sup> helps detect objects in your blind spots. When backing up, Rear Cross Traffic Alert<sup des="c3,3" class="disclosure-text feature-desclaimers">12</sup> helps detect vehicles approaching from the side. When vehicles are detected, you are alerted with a combination of audible and visual warnings.

disclaimer.text: 12 Always check your mirrors. Be aware of the traffic around you. There are limitations to the range and detection of the system. Please see your Owner’s Manual for further details.

content.heading: LANE-KEEP ASSIST
content.text: Lane-keep Assist<sup des="c4,4" class="disclosure-text feature-desclaimers">13</sup> adds to the warnings of the Lane Departure Warning System. When it senses a potential unintentional lane departure at speeds of 37 mph or higher, it will perform minor steering corrections to help guide your vehicle back to the center of the lane.

disclaimer.text: 13 Lane-keep Assist and Lane Departure Warning System operate at speeds of about 37 mph and faster. Neither system is a substitute for safe and attentive driving. There are limitations to the range and detection of each system. Please see your Owner’s Manual for further details.

content.heading: MAZDA RADAR CRUISE CONTROL WITH STOP & GO
content.text: Mazda Radar Cruise Control with Stop & Go<sup des="c5,5" class="disclosure-text feature-desclaimers">5</sup> maintains a set speed and minimum following distance from the traffic ahead. If the vehicle you’re following reduces speed, even down to a stop, your vehicle will automatically slow or stop as needed. Anything to make your commute a little easier.

disclaimer.text: 5 Mazda Radar Cruise Control (MRCC) with Stop & Go is not a substitute for safe and attentive driving. There are limitations to the range and detection of the system. Driver action is required to resume MRCC with Stop & Go after a complete stop. Please see your Owner’s Manual for further details.

content.heading: MAZDA CONNECTED SERVICES
content.text: With Mazda Connected Services, via the MyMazda App, you can remotely start your engine, lock or unlock your doors, access vehicle status reports and more, complimentary for 3 years.<sup des="c1,1" class="disclosure-text feature-desclaimers">1</sup>

disclaimer.text: 1 Connected service are subject to change at any time without notice. Mazda Connected Services is provided during a 3-year trial period; annual subscription fees apply thereafter. Use of MyMazda App and compatible phone are required. Connected services require cellular or Wi-Fi service. Data fees may apply. Never drive while distracted or while using a hand-held device. Please see your Owner’s Manual for important feature details and related privacy information.

content.heading: VEHICLE FINDER
content.text: Forgot where you parked your car? The MyMazda App pins your location on its map and provides the exact location of where you parked, as well as activates the hazard lights and horn to make it easier to find.<sup des="c2,1" class="disclosure-text feature-desclaimers">1</sup>

disclaimer.text: 1 Connected service are subject to change at any time without notice. Mazda Connected Services is provided during a 3-year trial period; annual subscription fees apply thereafter. Use of MyMazda App and compatible phone are required. Connected services require cellular or Wi-Fi service. Data fees may apply. Never drive while distracted or while using a hand-held device. Please see your Owner’s Manual for important feature details and related privacy information.

content.heading: VEHICLE HEALTH REPORT
content.text: The MyMazda App will proactively notify you when something may need your attention. Find out when your oil or lights need to be checked or when it’s time for service before possible mishaps occur on the road.<sup des="c3,1" class="disclosure-text feature-desclaimers">1</sup>

disclaimer.text: 1 Connected service are subject to change at any time without notice. Mazda Connected Services is provided during a 3-year trial period; annual subscription fees apply thereafter. Use of MyMazda App and compatible phone are required. Connected services require cellular or Wi-Fi service. Data fees may apply. Never drive while distracted or while using a hand-held device. Please see your Owner’s Manual for important feature details and related privacy information.

content.heading: CHECK YOUR MAZDA STATUS
content.text: Designed to help you plan your trips, the MyMazda App lets you check fuel, odometer, and other vehicle conditions before you head out for a drive.<sup des="c4,3" class="disclosure-text feature-desclaimers">1</sup>

disclaimer.text: 1 Connected service are subject to change at any time without notice. Mazda Connected Services is provided during a 3-year trial period; annual subscription fees apply thereafter. Use of MyMazda App and compatible phone are required. Connected services require cellular or Wi-Fi service. Data fees may apply. Never drive while distracted or while using a hand-held device. Please see your Owner’s Manual for important feature details and related privacy information.

content.heading: ELEGANT DETAILS THAT INSPIRE
content.text: Inviting and refined, the CX-9 Signature cabin is adorned with Nappa leather-trimmed seats and offers 2nd-row captain’s chairs.<sup des="c1,1" class="disclosure-text feature-desclaimers">1</sup> Additional comforts include heated steering wheel, heated front and rear seats and a power sliding-glass moonroof with sunshade to enjoy more of what’s outside.

disclaimer.text: 1 Captain’s chairs with center console standard on CX-9 Signature. Captain’s chairs with center walk-through standard on Carbon Edition and available with select CX-9 Touring, Touring Plus, and Grand Touring trims.

content.heading: INTERIOR SIGNATURE DESIGN
content.text: Upholstery plays a unique role in car design. The CX-9 Signature’s leather-trimmed interior is available in either Parchment or Deep Chestnut Nappa and includes details such as quilting and piping on the first- and second-row seats, leather-wrapped steering wheel, Santos Rosewood inlays and a geometric pattern in the aluminum trim.

content.heading: SECOND-ROW CAPTAIN'S CHAIRS
content.text: When designing the Mazda CX-9, everyone’s comfort was a consideration. Our Signature interior offers spacious 2nd-row captain’s chairs<sup des="c3,1" class="disclosure-text feature-desclaimers">4</sup> with a center console and 6-seat configuration to help elevate every moment together.

disclaimer.text: 4 Captain’s chairs with center console standard on CX-9 Signature. Captain’s chairs with center walk-through standard on Carbon Edition and available with select CX-9 Touring, Touring Plus, and Grand Touring trims.

content.heading: EXTERIOR SIGNATURE DESIGN
content.text: An expression of our artful design philosophy, Kodo: “Soul of Motion,” is very much alive in the CX-9 Signature. The exterior is highlighted by a Titanium Gray Metallic front grille and 20” alloy wheels with brilliant Silver finish. All elegant elements designed to create an emotional connection.

content.heading: CARBON EDITION
content.text: Take style to another level with the Carbon Edition. The Polymetal Gray Metallic paint, front grille and side mirrors in Black Gloss finish and red leather-trimmed seats are just a few touches added to create a bold narrative for the CX-9.

content.heading: STYLE MEETS PERFORMANCE
content.text: While the average 7-seat CUV is out of touch with the road, the CX-9 is on a first name basis with it.1 Our standard i-Activ AWD® helps predict and respond to traction loss, while the Skyactiv®-G 2.5 Turbo engine provides effortless acceleration when you need it most. G-Vectoring Control Plus helps deliver enhanced stability, so you’re well-equipped to handle every road you take.

disclaimer.text: 1 Mazda CX-9 provides seating for seven. Mazda CX-9 provides seating for six when equipped with available captain’s chairs.

content.heading: CONNECT TO THE DRIVE
content.text: Experience a completely holistic approach to driving. Mazda’s standard i-Activ AWD® and G-Vectoring Control Plus work together, proactively adjusting to changing road conditions. Combined with the responsive Skyactiv®-G 2.5 Turbo engine, the system is designed to create a more invigorating drive.

content.heading: STANDARD i-ACTIV AWD®
content.text: Experience an enhanced performance in any weather with Mazda i-Activ AWD®, now standard. It helps constantly monitor changing road conditions and adjusts power sent to each wheel for a more refined ride. When traversing uneven terrain, Off-road Traction Assist2 optimizes torque distribution and traction control, adding confidence to each drive.

disclaimer.text: 2 Available Off-road Traction Assist helps free tires that are stuck when vehicle tires become embedded in mud, sand or deep snow.

content.heading: G-VECTORING CONTROL PLUS
content.text: Every aspect is designed to work with you. G-Vectoring Control Plus responds to steering inputs with subtle engine torque and braking adjustments. The system provides enhanced stability for a smoother drive.

content.heading: REFINED PERFORMANCE
content.text: Poised to take on the road with even more authority, the Mazda3 is available with a responsive Skyactiv®-G 2.5 Turbo engine that delivers up to 250 hp1 and up to 320 lb-ft of torque.1 Paired with i-Activ AWD®, 2.5 Turbo models deliver a more confident, invigorating driving experience.

disclaimer.text: 1 250 hp and 320 lb-ft of torque with 93 octane fuel. 227 hp and 310 lb-ft of torque with 87 octane fuel.

content.heading: G-VECTORING CONTROL PLUS
content.text: Every aspect is designed to work with you. G-Vectoring Control Plus responds to steering inputs with subtle engine torque and braking adjustments. The system provides enhanced stability for a smoother drive.

content.heading: SKYACTIV® TECHNOLOGY
content.preheading: MORE PERFORMANCE. MORE EFFICIENCY. MORE ENJOYMENT.
content.text: Every aspect of the Mazda3 is engineered to work in harmony with you. The suspension considers the way the human body moves naturally—and balances to the car’s movements—for extraordinary handling and comfort. And the engine technology offers impressive fuel efficiency<sup des="c3,1" class="disclosure-text feature-desclaimers">7</sup> without compromising performance. Countless efforts have been made to enhance the joy from driving through a completely holistic, smarter approach.

disclaimer.text: 7 Based on EPA estimates for 2022 Mazda3 2.5 S Sedan with Premium Package and FWD, 26 city/35 highway MPG. Mazda3 2.5 Turbo Sedan with Premium Plus Package shown, 23 city/32 highway MPG.

content.heading: OUR NEWEST PREMIUM EXPRESSION: CARBON
content.text: For some, refinement is not a static notion, but a conscious action of continual elevation. This mindset is expressed in the new Mazda3 2.5 S Sedan Carbon Edition. Its Polymetal Gray Metallic exterior, complemented with 18” black alloy wheels and black heated side mirrors is designed to fuel your unending zeal.

content.heading: CONTOURS THAT CAPTIVATE
content.text: Kodo: “Soul of Motion,” Mazda’s design philosophy, seeks to create a sense of motion, even at a standstill. With curves and angles so striking, they command your attention at first glance. The Mazda3 Sedan presents a poised and dignified aesthetic that beckons to be driven.

content.heading: REDEFINING REFINEMENT
content.text: Meticulously crafted by the Mazda Takumi, the Mazda3 feels as if it were built just for you. Sophisticated upholstery palette choices are available in warm Greige tones or Red leather to create a welcoming and modern environment. An elegant level of refinement where every inch is designed to make your driving experience better.

content.heading: A PERFECT FIT
content.text: The cockpit of the Mazda3 is in perfect symmetry with you. For decades, we’ve studied the human body: how it moves, sensations of touch, sound and sight, muscle and skeletal structure. Every consideration has been made so the Mazda3 effortlessly responds to your direction.

content.heading: MAZDA CONNECTED SERVICES
content.text: Remotely start the engine, check vehicle status reports and more through the MyMazda App with Mazda Connected Services, complimentary for three years.<sup des="c1,1" class="disclosure-text feature-desclaimers">1</sup> And so you don’t miss a moment, your vehicle is available with in-car Wi-Fi<sup des="c1,2" class="disclosure-text feature-desclaimers">2</sup> complimentary for 3 months or up to 2 GB —and provides access to emergency services like automatic 911<sup des="c1,3" class="disclosure-text feature-desclaimers">3</sup> dialing and roadside assistance.

disclaimer.text: 1 Connected services are subject to change at any time without notice. Mazda Connected Services is provided during a 3-year trial period; annual subscription fees apply thereafter. Use of MyMazda App and compatible phone are required. Connected services require cellular or Wi-Fi service. Data fees may apply. Never drive while distracted or while using a hand-held device. Please see your Owner’s Manual for important feature details and related privacy information.

2 Connected services are subject to change at any time without notice. 3-month/2GB wireless data trial provides access to AT&T’s wireless data services. Eligible vehicle, compatible SIM card and trial activation by customer required. 3-month period begins at time of trial activation; wireless data service expires when 2GB of data is used or when 3-month period ends, whichever comes first. Hotspot connects up to 5 Wi-Fi capable devices, which use data from your plan. Wi-Fi hotspot functionality not available outside of U.S. & Canada. Service in Canada subject to unaffiliated carrier coverage. Offer, terms, and pricing subject to change. Coverage and service not available everywhere. Visit www.att.com/USTermsandconditions for more information. Never drive while distracted or while using a hand-held device. Please see your Owner’s Manual for important feature details and related privacy information.

3 Mobile 911 automatically calls 911 from a paired hands-free device when a moderate to severe collision is detected. Specific phone settings are required. There are limitations to the system. Please see your Owner’s Manual for further details.

For Android users, Android Auto™ integration<sup des="c5,1" class="disclosure-text feature-desclaimers">5</sup> is also available.

content.heading: BOSE® AUDIO
content.text: Create the perfect soundtrack for your journey with an available 12-speaker premium audio system from Bose.® The speakers in the Mazda3 are specifically positioned, by our engineers, for optimal sound quality and are calibrated precisely for all occupants to enjoy.

content.heading: i-ACTIVSENSE® SAFETY TECHNOLOGY
content.text: i-Activsense® is a suite of sophisticated standard and available safety features<sup des="c1,1" class="disclosure-text feature-desclaimers">1</sup> that can alert you to hazards to help you avoid collisions—or lessen their impact. These features help improve your visibility and awareness of the road, and help monitor the traffic conditions around you.

disclaimer.text: 1 i-Activsense® safety features are not a substitute for safe and attentive driving. There are limitations to the range and detection of each safety feature. Safety features vary based on vehicle package and trim combinations. Please see your Owner’s Manual for further details.

content.heading: i-ACTIVSENSE® SAFETY TECHNOLOGY
content.text: Take away some of the stress from your daily commute with Traffic Jam Assist<sup des="c2,1" class="disclosure-text feature-desclaimers">8</sup> which enhances the Mazda3’s Mazda Radar Cruise Control with low-speed steering assist at speeds of up to 40 mph. Available with select Mazda3 2.5 Turbo Sedan models.

disclaimer.text: 8 Traffic Jam Assist is not a substitute for safe and attentive driving. There are limitations to the range and detection of the system. Please see your Owner’s Manual for further details.

content.heading: i-ACTIVSENSE® SAFETY TECHNOLOGY
content.text: Parking becomes easy with the Mazda3’s easy-to-use front and rear parking sensors.<sup des="c3,1" class="disclosure-text feature-desclaimers">9</sup> A warning will sound when the sensors detect you’re too close to an object and increase in frequency as you get closer. Available with select Mazda3 2.5 Turbo Sedan models.

disclaimer.text: 9 Always check your mirrors. Be aware of your surroundings. There are limitations to the range and detection of the system. Please see your Owner’s Manual for further details.

content.heading: i-ACTIVSENSE® SAFETY TECHNOLOGY
content.text: See a more complete view of your surroundings in every direction with the 360° View Monitor<sup des="c4,1" class="disclosure-text feature-desclaimers">10</sup> via the 8.8” dashboard-mounted Mazda Connect™ screen. Available with select Mazda3 2.5 Turbo Sedan models.

disclaimer.text: 10 360º View Monitor may not provide a comprehensive view of the entire surrounding area of this vehicle. Always check your surroundings visually. Please see your Owner’s Manual for further details.

content.heading: i-ACTIVSENSE® SAFETY TECHNOLOGY
content.text: When backing up, available Rear Cross Traffic Alert<sup des="c5,1" class="disclosure-text feature-desclaimers">11</sup> helps detect a vehicle approaching from the side and promptly alerts the driver with an audible warning, as well as a visual warning, in either side mirror and the Rear View Monitor display.

disclaimer.text: 11 Always check your mirrors. Be aware of the traffic around you. There are limitations to the range and detection of the system. Please see your Owner’s Manual for further details.

content.heading: i-ACTIVSENSE® SAFETY TECHNOLOGY
content.text: When backing up, the system works in concert with Rear Cross Traffic Alert. If an impact is predicted, models equipped with Smart Brake Support–Rear Crossing<sup des="c6,1" class="disclosure-text feature-desclaimers">12</sup> can automatically brake to help avoid a collision or reduce damage in the event of a collision. Available with select Mazda3 2.5 Turbo Sedan models.

disclaimer.text: 12 Smart Brake Support-Rear Crossing operates under certain conditions when a vehicle approaches from the rear left or rear right while you reverse out of a parking space. It is not a substitute for safe and attentive driving and is only designed to reduce damage in the event of a collision. There are limitations to the operation and detection of the system. Please see your Owner’s Manual for further details.

With features like Advanced Smart City Brake Support with Day and Night-time Pedestrian Detection<sup des="c1,2" class="disclosure-text feature-desclaimers">2</sup> and available Traffic Jam Assist,<sup des="c1,1" class="disclosure-text feature-desclaimers">1</sup> it’s all part of our goal to create safer cars and more confident drivers.

content.heading: BLIND SPOT MONITORING
content.text: Blind Spot Monitoring<sup des="c2,1" class="disclosure-text feature-desclaimers">1</sup> helps detect objects in your blind spots and alerts you with a chime and warning light in your side mirror and in the available Active Driving Display (when equipped). There are some surprises that are worth doing without.

disclaimer.text: 1 Always check your mirrors. Be aware of the traffic around you. There are limitations to the range and detection of the system. Please see your Owner’s Manual for further details.

content.heading: REAR CROSS TRAFFIC ALERT
content.text: When backing up, Rear Cross Traffic Alert<sup des="c3,2" class="disclosure-text feature-desclaimers">2</sup> helps detect a vehicle approaching from the side and promptly alerts the driver with an audible warning, as well as a visual warning, in either side mirror and the Rear View Monitor display.

disclaimer.text: 2 Always check your mirrors. Be aware of the traffic around you. There are limitations to the range and detection of the system. Please see your Owner’s Manual for further details.

content.heading: MAZDA RADAR CRUISE CONTROL
content.text: Maintain a set speed and minimum following distance from the traffic ahead with Mazda Radar Cruise Control with Stop & Go.<sup des="c4,3" class="disclosure-text feature-desclaimers">3</sup> If the vehicle you’re following reduces speed, even down to a stop, your vehicle will automatically slow down or stop as needed.

disclaimer.text: 3 Mazda Radar Cruise Control (MRCC) with Stop & Go is not a substitute for safe and attentive driving. There are limitations to the range and detection of the system. Driver action is required to resume MRCC with Stop & Go after a complete stop. Please see your Owner’s Manual for further details.

content.heading: ADAPTIVE FRONT-LIGHTING SYSTEM
content.text: This available system is designed to help you see around corners at night. As you turn a corner, the LED headlights pivot in the direction of your turn, improve visibility and allow you to spot potential hazards ahead. Now isn’t that illuminating?

content.heading: SMART BRAKING SYSTEM
content.text: Mazda’s automatic braking technology includes standard high and low speed systems<sup des="c6,7" class="disclosure-text feature-desclaimers">7</sup> (shown) and an available system that works while in reverse.<sup des="c6,8" class="disclosure-text feature-desclaimers">8</sup> If an impact is predicted, these systems will warn the driver and, if necessary, apply the brakes.

disclaimer.text: 7 Advanced Smart City Brake Support with Day and Night-time Pedestrian Detection operates under certain conditions between about 2 and 50 mph when object is a vehicle and between about 6.2 to 50 mph when the object is a pedestrian. It is not a substitute for safe and attentive driving and is only designed to reduce damage in the event of a collision. There are limitations to the operation and detection of the system. Please see your Owner’s Manual for further details.

8 Smart City Brake Support–Reverse operates under certain conditions between about 2 and 4 mph when an obstruction is detected at the rear of the vehicle. It is not a substitute for safe and attentive driving and is only designed to reduce damage in the event of a collision. There are limitations to the operation and detection of the system. Please see your Owner’s Manual for further details.

content.heading: LANE DEPARTURE WARNING AND LANE-KEEP ASSIST
content.text: When travelling at the speed of 37 mph or higher, the Lane Departure Warning System<sup des="c7,10" class="disclosure-text feature-desclaimers">10</sup> gives you a combination of audible and visual warnings when it detects that you are about to unintentionally depart from your lane. And with Lane-keep Assist,<sup des="c7,10" class="disclosure-text feature-desclaimers">10</sup> minor steering corrections are made to help keep your vehicle in its lane.

disclaimer.text: 10 Lane Departure Warning System and Lane-keep Assist operate at speeds of about 37 mph and faster. Neither system is a substitute for safe and attentive driving. There are limitations to the range and detection of each system. Please see your Owner’s Manual for further details.

content.heading: DRIVER ATTENTION ALERT
content.text: Available Driver Attention Alert<sup des="c8,11" class="disclosure-text feature-desclaimers">11</sup> monitors the driver’s steering and throttle inputs and lane position. When it recognizes driving behavior suggesting driver fatigue or decreased attentiveness, it activates a warning sound and displays an alert in the LCD Meter Display.

disclaimer.text: 11 Driver Attention Alert operates between about 40 to 87 mph. It is not a substitute for safe and attentive driving. There are limitations to the operation and detection of the system. Please see your Owner’s Manual for further details.

content.text: Remotely start the engine, check vehicle status reports and more through the MyMazda App with Mazda Connected Services, complimentary for three years.<sup des="c1,1" class="disclosure-text feature-desclaimers">1</sup> And so you don’t miss a moment, your vehicle can also be equipped with in-car Wi-Fi<sup des="c1,2" class="disclosure-text feature-desclaimers">2</sup> capabilities—and provide access to emergency services like automatic 911<sup des="c1,3" class="disclosure-text feature-desclaimers">3</sup> dialing and roadside assistance.

content.heading: REMOTE ENGINE START
content.text: Start your CX-5’s engine and return to the previously set interior temperature before you even get in. It’s comfort and convenience right at your fingertips.<sup des="c2,1" class="disclosure-text feature-desclaimers">1</sup>

disclaimer.text: 1 Connected services are subject to change at any time without notice. Mazda Connected Services is provided during a 3-year trial period; annual subscription fees apply thereafter. Use of MyMazda App and compatible phone are required. Connected services require cellular or Wi-Fi service. Data fees may apply. Never drive while distracted or while using a hand-held device. Please see your Owner’s Manual for important feature details and related privacy information.

content.heading: VEHICLE FINDER
content.text: Forgot where you parked your car? The MyMazda App pins the location of your vehicle on the map and shows you its exact spot, as well as activates the hazard lights and horn to make it easier to find.<sup des="c3,1" class="disclosure-text feature-desclaimers">1</sup>

disclaimer.text: 1 Connected services are subject to change at any time without notice. Mazda Connected Services is provided during a 3-year trial period; annual subscription fees apply thereafter. Please see your Owner’s Manual for important feature details and related privacy information.

content.heading: VEHICLE HEALTH AND STATUS
content.text: The MyMazda App can proactively notify you when something may need your attention. Find out when your oil, lights, or tire pressure should be checked; or when it’s time for service — before you get on the road.<sup des="c4,1" class="disclosure-text feature-desclaimers">1</sup>

content.heading: SEAMLESS CONNECTION
content.text: Enjoy the convenience of your smartphone while on the road with Mazda Connect™.<sup des="c5,4" class="disclosure-text feature-desclaimers">4</sup> Featuring Apple CarPlay™ integration<sup des="c5,5" class="disclosure-text feature-desclaimers">5</sup> for your iPhone® (shown) and Android Auto™ integration,<sup des="c5,5" class="disclosure-text feature-desclaimers">5</sup> you can access maps, playlists, contacts and more, and view them clearly on the large 10.25-inch center display.

disclaimer.text: 4 Don’t drive while distracted. Even with voice commands, only use Mazda Connect™/ other devices when safe. Some features may require cellular or Wi-Fi service; some features may be locked out while the vehicle is in motion. Not all features are compatible with all phones. Message and data rates may apply.

Third-party interface providers are solely responsible for their product functionality and third-party terms and privacy statements apply. Don’t drive while distracted or while using a hand-held device. Android and Android Auto are trademarks of Google LLC. Apple CarPlay, iPhone and Siri are trademarks of Apple Inc.

content.heading: BOSE® AUDIO
content.text: Every inspiring performance deserves a proper soundtrack. Enjoy crisp and clear music through the available 10-speaker Bose® audio system, featuring a unique speaker design and layout for optimal listening throughout the cabin.

content.heading: THE SIGNATURE EXTERIOR
content.text: Drawing inspiration from our Kodo design philosophy, the Mazda CX-5 2.5 Turbo Signature takes its sleek exterior styling to new levels. With a redesigned front grille, 19” alloy wheels and a matching body-colored lower bumper and wheel arches, it stands out in the city, from every angle.

content.heading: THE NEW LOOK OF TURBO
content.text: The 2022 Mazda CX-5 2.5 Turbo offers a distinct aesthetic that beckons to be driven. It’s outfitted with a gloss black grille with red accents, along with a chrome black signature wing and 19” black alloy wheels for a look that stimulates the senses.

content.heading: ART IN EVERY DETAIL
content.text: The CX-5 interior surrounds you with sophistication. The Signature trim offers genuine layered wood trim and Caturra Brown Nappa leather-trimmed seats while the 2.5 Turbo is styled with a black leather interior and red stitching.

content.heading: AVAILABLE TURBO + STANDARD AWD
content.text: The Mazda CX-5 offers a harmonious balance of responsive handling and effortless acceleration. With i-Activ AWD®, now standard, along with an increase in horsepower1 available for Turbo models, it’s engineered to invigorate each drive.

disclaimer.text: 1 Increased horsepower available only when using 93 octane fuel. 2022 CX-5 Turbo models: 256 hp with 93 octane fuel. 227 hp with 87 octane fuel. 2021 CX-5 Turbo models: 250 hp with 93 octane fuel. 227 hp with 87 octane fuel.

content.heading: MI-DRIVE TECHNOLOGY
content.text: Available Mazda Intelligent Drive Select technology (Mi-Drive) allows you to customize your drive modes along various roads and surfaces. With the flip of a switch you can choose between Normal, Sport and Off-Road Modes for a more tailored performance and a deeper connection between you and your vehicle.

content.heading: YOUR WORLD. AT YOUR FINGERTIPS.
content.text: Never miss a moment with Apple CarPlay™<sup des="c4,1" class="disclosure-text feature-desclaimers">3</sup> integration for your iPhone®. Access maps, playlists, contacts and compatible apps with your voice through Siri. All that and more is powered by the intuitive Mazda ConnectTM Infotainment System.<sup des="c4,2" class="disclosure-text feature-desclaimers">4</sup> All your options appear on the vivid 8.8-inch center-mounted display—operated using the multifunction Commander control or with voice prompts.

content.heading: BOSE® AUDIO
content.text: The right soundtrack can turn any moment into something more. Whatever musical genre accompanies your drive, hear it as the artist intended on the available 12-speaker Bose® sound system. Custom-engineered for the CX-30, it’s the next best thing to being there live.

content.heading: i-ACTIVSENSE® SAFETY TECHNOLOGY
content.text: With features like standard Smart Brake Support<sup des="c1,3" class="disclosure-text feature-desclaimers">11</sup> (front drive detection) and available Rear Cross Traffic Alert,<sup des="c1,2" class="disclosure-text feature-desclaimers">10</sup> i-Activsense® is a suite of sophisticated safety features<sup des="c1,1" class="disclosure-text feature-desclaimers">5</sup> that can alert you to hazards to help you avoid collisions—or lessen their severity.

disclaimer.text: 5 i-Activsense® safety features are not a substitute for safe and attentive driving. There are limitations to the range and detection of each safety feature. Safety features vary based on vehicle package and trim combinations. Please see your Owner’s Manual for further details.
10 Always check your mirrors. Be aware of the traffic around you. There are limitations to the range and detection of the system. Please see your Owner’s Manual for further details.

11 Smart Brake Support (front drive detection) operates under certain conditions between about 6.3 and 49 mph when the object is a pedestrian or bicycle and 3 mph or higher when the object is a vehicle. It is not a substitute for safe and attentive driving and is only designed to reduce damage in the event of a collision. There are limitations to the operation and detection of the system. Please see your Owner’s Manual for further details.

content.heading: i-ACTIVSENSE® SAFETY TECHNOLOGY
content.text: Available Blind Spot Monitoring<sup des="c2,1" class="disclosure-text feature-desclaimers">1</sup> helps detect objects in your blind spots and alerts you with a warning light in your side mirrors and Active Driving Display (when equipped). It also helps detect and warns you of fast approaching vehicles that may enter your blind spot.

disclaimer.text: 1 Always check your mirrors. Be aware of the traffic around you. There are limitations to the range and detection of the system. Please see your Owner’s Manual for further details.

content.heading: REAR CROSS TRAFFIC ALERT
content.text: When backing up, available Rear Cross Traffic Alert<sup des="c3,1" class="disclosure-text feature-desclaimers">10</sup> helps detect a vehicle approaching from the side and promptly alerts the driver with an audible warning, as well as a visual warning, in either side mirror and the Rear View Monitor.

disclaimer.text: 10 Always check your mirrors. Be aware of the traffic around you. There are limitations to the range and detection of the system. Please see your Owner’s Manual for further details.

content.heading: MAZDA RADAR CRUISE CONTROL WITH STOP AND GO
content.text: Mazda Radar Cruise Control with Stop and Go<sup des="c4,1" class="disclosure-text feature-desclaimers">11</sup> maintains a set speed and minimum following distance from the traffic ahead. If the vehicle you’re following reduces speed, even down to a stop, your vehicle will automatically slow to a stop as needed.

disclaimer.text: 11 Mazda Radar Cruise Control (MRCC) with Stop & Go is not a substitute for safe and attentive driving. There are limitations to the range and detection of the system. Driver action is required to resume MRCC with Stop & Go after a complete stop. Please see your Owner’s Manual for further details.

content.heading: SMART BRAKE SUPPORT WITH PEDESTRIAN DETECTION
content.text: Smart Brake Support<sup des="c5,1" class="disclosure-text feature-desclaimers">12</sup> (front drive detection) in the Mazda CX-30 helps detect vehicles, pedestrians, and bicyclists in your path. If an impact is predicted, the system will warn the driver and if necessary, apply the brakes.

disclaimer.text: 12 Smart Brake Support (front drive detection) operates under certain conditions between about 6.3 and 49 mph when the object is a pedestrian or bicycle and 3 mph or higher when the object is a vehicle. It is not a substitute for safe and attentive driving and is only designed to reduce damage in the event of a collision. There are limitations to the operation and detection of the system. Please see your Owner’s Manual for further details.

content.heading: LANE-KEEP ASSIST
content.text: Lane-keep Assist<sup des="c6,1" class="disclosure-text feature-desclaimers">13</sup> adds to the warnings of the Lane Departure Warning System. When it senses a potential unintentional lane departure at speeds of 40 mph or higher, it will perform minor steering corrections to help prevent your vehicle from exiting the lane.

disclaimer.text: 13 Lane Departure Warning System and Lane-keep Assist operate at speeds of about 40 mph and faster. Neither system is a substitute for safe and attentive driving. There are limitations to the range and detection of each system. Please see your Owner’s Manual for further details.

content.heading: LIGHT BECOMES ART
content.text: Creating an inviting and invigorating environment, the CX-30’s cabin is a study in essential elegance. From available perforated leather and premium stitching to a choice of sophisticated color palettes, it’s a space, and a CUV, that lets you focus on what’s in front of you—and imagine what might be around the next corner.

content.heading: SAVOR EVERY MOMENT
content.text: Creating an inviting and invigorating environment, the CX-30’s cabin is a study in essential elegance. From available perforated leather and premium stitching to a choice of sophisticated color palettes, it’s a space, and a CUV, that lets you focus on what’s in front of you—and imagine what might be around the next corner.

content.heading: A PERFECT FIT
content.text: Every consideration, such as the placement of displays and gauges, has been made so the cabin of the CX-30 feels as if it was sculpted around you. And with a trunk capacity of 20.2 cubic feet, or up to 45.2 cubic feet with rear seats down, it provides plenty of cargo space for your next adventure. Because you never know what the next moment has in store.

content.heading: TURBOCHARGED ENGINE & STANDARD i-ACTIV AWD®
content.text: No matter where your path leads, the Mazda CX-30 2.5 Turbo is made to help you follow it. The Skyactiv®-G 2.5 Turbo engine delivers up to a responsive 250 hp<sup des="c1,1" class="disclosure-text feature-desclaimers">2</sup> and 320 lb-ft of torque.<sup des="c1,1" class="disclosure-text feature-desclaimers">2</sup> Paired with our i-Activ AWD®, now standard on all trim levels, this CUV offers dynamic performance that makes every moment worth savoring.

disclaimer.text: 2 250 hp and 320 lb-ft of torque with 93 octane fuel. 227 hp and 310 lb-ft of torque with 87 octane fuel.

content.heading: GO SWIFTLY
content.text: In the CX-30, every moment behind the wheel feels effortlessly engaging thanks to G-Vectoring Control Plus. Working in concert with i-Activ AWD®, GVC Plus makes precise adjustments to power delivery and braking to subtly shift vehicle weight, providing a smoother and more uplifting drive. You’ve never experienced a compact crossover like this.

content.heading: GO CONFIDENTLY
content.text: Not every road is a smooth one. But you’ve got i-Activ AWD®, now standard across all CX-30 models. Constantly monitoring vehicle dynamics data, this AWD system sends torque to the tires with the most grip to help you maintain traction in almost any road condition, enhancing your performance on every drive.

content.heading: GO SMOOTHLY
content.text: In the CX-30, every moment behind the wheel feels effortlessly engaging thanks to G-Vectoring Control Plus. Working in concert with i-Activ AWD®, GVC Plus makes precise adjustments to power delivery and braking to subtly shift vehicle weight, providing a smoother and more uplifting drive. You’ve never experienced a compact crossover like this.
